data.title: FC KTP / Kotkan Futis Oy
data.meta_description:
FC KTP / Kotkan Futis Oy | 405 followers on LinkedIn. FC KTP, founded in 1927.  One of the most recognizable football club brands in Finland. #FromTheDocks #KTPKotka  | FC KTP is a finnish football club, founded in 1927. The club has a strong history and surely an exciting future ahead. Our men’s team is during season 2023 playing in Veikkausliiga, which is the highest football league in Finland and women’s team is playing on the second highest football league (Naisten Ykkönen) 
Our mentality on field as well as in business is to fight until the final whistle.
data.text: Exciting Developments Alert! Hey there, football enthusiasts! Today, we're thrilled to share some exhilarating news straight from the heart of Kotka, home to none other than the iconic KTP. Brace yourselves for a story that promises to elevate the game to new heights! Dreams Taking Shape: Picture this: the roar of the crowd, the green expanse of the pitch, and towering above it all, a state-of-the-art stadium that embodies the spirit of KTP. Thanks to a groundbreaking partnership with a local construction company, this dream is soon to become a reality! Partners in Progress: KTP has joined forces with a renowned local construction company Kalevi Suntio Oy and city of Kotka, sharing a vision to create a stadium that not only serves as a fortress for the team but also stands as a beacon of pride for the entire community. This partnership represents a harmonious blend of expertise, passion, and dedication, a recipe for success both on and off the field. A Stadium for All: But wait, there's more! Arto Tolsa areena isn't just for football, it's for the entire community to enjoy. With modern amenities, versatile event spaces, and cutting-edge facilities, the new stadium will be a hub for sports, entertainment, and cultural events alike. Whether you're a die-hard football fan or simply looking for a place to gather with friends and family, the stadium promises something for everyone. Sustainable and Eco-Friendly: In keeping with KTP's commitment to environmental stewardship, the stadium project will prioritize sustainability at every turn. From energy-efficient design elements to eco-friendly construction practices, every effort is being made to minimize the stadium's ecological footprint and leave a positive impact on the environment. A Legacy in the Making: As construction kicks into high gear, excitement is building within the community. This stadium isn't just a structure, it's a symbol of progress, unity, and the unwavering spirit of KTP. With each brick laid and each beam raised, a legacy is being forged, one that will be celebrated for generations to come. So, here's to KTP and their visionary partnership with a Kalevi Suntio Oy, city of Kotka, a testament to the power of teamwork, determination, and the belief that with passion and perseverance, anything is possible. Get ready to witness history in the making! #ArtoTolsaAreena https://lnkd.in/d8cudWwr
